metadata.title: CVE-2024-46769 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:spi: intel: Add check devm_kasprintf() returned valueintel_spi_populate_chip() use devm_kasprintf() to set pdata->name.This can return a NULL pointer on failure but this returned valueis not checked.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
